name: Pizza Toppings Casserole
ingredients: 8 ounces whole milk mozzarella cheese, cut into small cubes
utensils: 7x9" deep baking dish or 7x12" shallow baking dish

instructions.en: Brown sausage with mushrooms; drain grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte klobásu s hubami; zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: ソーセージをマッシュルームと一緒に炒めて、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Whisk eggs, cream, pizza sauce, and seasonings in a bowl.
instructions.sk: V miske vyšľahajte vajcia, smotanu, pizzovú omáčku a korenie.
instructions.ja: ボウルで卵、クリーム、ピザソース、調味料を混ぜます。

instructions.en: Layer meats, mushrooms, peppers, and cheese in greased baking dish. Pour egg mixture over and mix. Top with onion and additional seasonings.
instructions.sk: Do vymastenej zapekacej misky vrstvite mäso, huby, papriku a syr. Zalejte vaječnou zmesou a premiešajte. Navrch dajte cibuľu a ďalšie korenie.
instructions.ja: 油を塗った焼き皿に肉、マッシュルーム、ピーマン、チーズを層にして入れます。卵液を注いで混ぜ、玉ねぎと追加の調味料をのせます。

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45-55 minutes until browned and mostly set. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 175°C 45-55 minút, kým nezhnedne a takmer sa neustáli. Pred podávaním nechajte 5 minút odstáť.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで45-55分、茶色くなりほぼ固まるまで焼きます。提供前に5分間置きます。

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Pizza sauce recipe included separately.
